trans-unit.source: Provides data for the layout event for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de layout para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The layout event occurs when the size or position of the designer or its contained components change.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O evento de layout ocorre quando o tamanho ou posição de designer ou seus componentes independentes alterar.

trans-unit.source: The ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs contains the graphics used to make layout changes and the designer theme to use for look and feel.
trans-unit.target: O ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs contém os elementos gráficos usados para fazer alterações de layout e o tema a ser usado para a aparência do designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o gráfico especificado e o tema de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used the layout the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usou o layout do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> to use for look and feel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> a ser usado para a aparência.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the root workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> associado com o fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe designer look and feel properties, such as colors, styles, and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>é usado para descrever as propriedades de aparência designer, como planos de fundo, estilos e cores.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> que contém informações de tema para designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver um designer um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>associados a ele, o designer usará as propriedades de aparência descritas pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>para pintar em si.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>está associado com o designer, o designer usará o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>para redesenhar suas propriedades de aparência.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> que descreve a aparência designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to lay out the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para definir o layout do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto fornece métodos para desenhar objetos no dispositivo de vídeo.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to lay out the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para definir o layout do designer.
